MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL66 and LL68  postcode areas of Rhosgoch and Amlwch, affecting properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.00PM due to a low hanging electrical line. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 9.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.46PM on 21st February 2021.
